thread.title: Rich Snider
thread.title_full: SelectQuote Auto & Home reviewed by Rich Snider

author: Rich Snider
title: Rich Snider
text: Talked to Select Quote: about Home insurance and stated problem I had with old insurance company. The agent took my information and shopped the industry for me and saved me time and money. I got the type and amount of insurance I was looking for and at the right price. In fact, I got ,more coverage at less money! Highly recommend Select Quote:
